generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and arrows, which is clearly designated for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, adjacent to the building, with a person walking on it.
- building: A building with a red "HOTEL" sign is visible on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Trees with green and yellow leaves are visible along the road and in the background.
- terrain: Grass is visible on the left side of the road, behind a curb.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible through the tree canopy in the upper part of the image.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including a silver car directly in front of the viewer and other vehicles in the adjacent lanes.
- truck: A truck with a covered cargo area is visible on the left side of the road.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible in the distance, mounted on a pole, showing a green light.
- traffic sign: Several traffic signs are visible, including a blue sign with white text and symbols on the left side of the road, and a red "HOTEL" sign on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including the pole supporting the traffic light and the poles supporting the traffic signs.
- fence: A fence is visible in the background, behind the trees on the left side of the road.
